title: Did any freshers attend the clg today?
content:

comments.body: U missed giving intros, a big loss indeed ðŸ˜ž /s
Uhm no, your batch is starting quite late, they won't waste much time, also u have classes till 4:45. Better ask a R3 person :)

they prolly wont have much for u guys, cause its starting so late for yall, we got a whole ass week of an event called bootstrap.

boderline waste of time today dw, you missed nothing
